name: Featured Posts Widget
author: Tom Singer

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin to create a Featured Posts widget

Features:
* Customisable title
* Select categories to choose posts from
* Customisable thumbnails (none, above, below, left, right)
* Customisable thumbnail sizes

Thanks

Initial image code, customisations and WP_Query refactor from https://twitter.com/_ericholmes to help create a real 1.0 version
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Customisable title
  • Select categories to choose posts from
  • Customisable thumbnails (none, above, below, left, right)
  • Customisable thumbnail sizes
  • Better use of WP_Query
